snippet: The rising influx of young unauthorized immigrants crossing the border with or without parents has become a humanitarian crisis.
abstract: Editorial acknowledges growing crisis in which increased numbers of child illegal immigrants are crossing United States' southern border fleeing growing violence in their home countries; praises government's top-level task force to see to pressing needs of children as important first step; faults Republicans for blaming Obama administration policies for wave of immigrants and discounts as fantasy party's idea that border enforcement alone will solve problem.
lead_paragraph: The rising influx of young unauthorized immigrants crossing the border with or without parents has become a humanitarian crisis.
